remarks: Induction on the upper set of integers that starts at an integer ` M ` , using explicit substitution.  The hypotheses are the basis and the induction step.  Use this instead of ~ uzind4s when ` j ` and ` k ` must be distinct in ` [. ( k + 1 ) / j ]. ph ` .  (Contributed by NM, 16-Nov-2005.)
statement:
uzind4s2.1 $e |- ( M e. ZZ -> [. M / j ]. ph ) $.
uzind4s2.2 $e |- ( k e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) -> ( [. k / j ]. ph -> [. ( k + 1 ) / j ]. ph ) ) $.
uzind4s2 $p |- ( N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) -> [. N / j ]. ph ) $.
$d M k $.
$d j k $.
$d k ph $.
